channel.title: password manager on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in password manager on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Firefox Lockwise Logo
Firefox Lockwise is a deprecated password manager for the Firefox web browser, as well as the mobile operating systems iOS and Android. On desktop, Lockwise is simply part of Firefox, whereas on iOS and Android it is available as a standalone app. If Firefox Sync is activated, then Lockwise syncs passwords between Firefox installations across devices. It also features a built-in random password generator. The application and branding have since been “phased out.
You can download theFirefox Lockwiselogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Firefox Lockwise
item.description: Firefox Lockwise is a deprecated password manager for the Firefox web browser, as well as the mobile operating systems iOS and Android. On desktop, Lockwise is simply part of Firefox, whereas on iOS and Android it is available as a standalone app. If Firefox Sync is activated, then Lockwise syncs passwords between Firefox installations across devices. It also features a built-in random password generator. The application and branding have since been “phased out.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
1Password Logo 1Password is a password manager developed by AgileBits Inc. It provides a place for users to store various passwords, software licenses, and other sensitive information in a virtual vault that is locked with a PBKDF2-guarded master password. By default, the user’s encrypted vault is hosted on AgileBits' servers for a monthly fee. The company is based in Toronto. Source
You can download the1Passwordlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: 1Password
item.description: 1Password is a password manager developed by AgileBits Inc. It provides a place for users to store various passwords, software licenses, and other sensitive information in a virtual vault that is locked with a PBKDF2-guarded master password. By default, the user’s encrypted vault is hosted on AgileBits' servers for a monthly fee. The company is based in Toronto. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Dashlane Logo Dashlane is a cross-platform subscription-based password manager and digital wallet application available on macOS, Windows, iOS and Android. Dashlane uses a freemium pricing model which includes both a free tier and a premium subscription. Source
You can download theDashlanelogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
